definitions.definition: An object used to erase or remove something written or drawn by a pen or a pencil .
examples: I have worn out the eraser on this pencil.

definitions.definition: An object used to erase something written either by chalk on a chalkboard , by a marker on a whiteboard , or by some other erasable implement; a chalkboard eraser, whiteboard eraser, etc.
An overwriter program used to prevent data recovery.

secondary_definitions: ( Canada , US , Philippines ) An object used to erase or remove something written or drawn by a pen or a pencil .

( Canada , US , Philippines ) An object used to erase something written either by chalk on a chalkboard , by a marker on a whiteboard , or by some other erasable implement; a chalkboard eraser, whiteboard eraser, etc.
( computing ) An overwriter program used to prevent data recovery.
